document_data.name: Sword Ghosts
document_data.mainbody: The '''Sword Ghosts''' was a group of [[fighter]]s and [[thieves]] active during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Base of Operations: The Sword Ghosts were based in the northern city of [[Luskan]].
document_data.Members: Members of the Sword Ghosts included [[Clion]] and his friend [[Raymid]].
